review: I love the Amazon Fire Stick.  It was super simple to install and gave me immediate access to all sorts of streaming apps.  I haven't been able to figure out how to make sure my kids don't accidentally make purchases while looking for movies to watch, but that hasn't seemed to be an issue as of yet.  But I would still definitely recommend this to anyone.
author: Lora

review: Works very well.  Especially well on the Amazon App.  We already have a Roku and got this to vary the devices a bit.
author: flyclt "flyclt"

review: I have two of these.  They work great! So much better than trying to stream from a laptop to the tv.
author: Amazon Customer

review: works great, love having the remote. Super anoying to use if you lose the remote.
author: Hunter Smith

review: Wow This little thing is great. streams great shows. no more running an hdmi cord from my pc to tv. i can move it easily to any tv in the house.
author: M. Smith

review: Nothing better than the Fire Tv Stick
author: Stephanie M. Jones

review: Great product! Bought to replace a secondary cable box that was costing me $10 monthly. Very responsive with very little lag on most applications I have installed. Overall quite pleased with the product and would recommend, especially for purchasers who already have Amazon Prime.
author: Wayne Miller

review: Easy to connect. However when I moved it away from the modem (20 feet), the signal dropped. I have high speed FIOS and this shouldn't happen. The door to the other was open and it had a difficult time buffering. I was disappointed because I was thinking of getting another stick for the other room.  Now, I won't need to do this. I have to keep it near the modem.
author: n.e.
